maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Receptionist
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Réceptionniste

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Move along, nothing to see here!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Circulez, y a rien à voir ici !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Nice seeing you around, rookie. We have no need of your assistance just now though.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Je suis heureux de vous voir, Recrue. Nous n'avons pas besoin de votre assistance pour le moment.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: A \v[lore.title.seeker] recruit?\. You better get your faction-briefing at \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-Central\c[0] first, before going sightseeing.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Une recrue \v[lore.title.seeker] ?\. Vous devriez d'abord assister à votre introduction aux factions au \c[3]Repère des \v[lore.title.seeker]s\c[0] avant de faire du tourisme.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: You can find the responsible official on the ground floor of that building.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous trouverez l'officier responsable de cela au rez-de-chaussée du Repère.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Ah, it looks like the young \v[lore.title.seeker] has returned to plain ol' me.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Ah, je vois que le jeune \v[lore.title.seeker] n'a pas oublié le vieil homme que je suis.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Can you finally squeeze some work in the name of justice into your schedule?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Est-ce que finalement vous avez un peu de temps à consacrer pour travailler au nom de la justice ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: It's good to see a young \v[lore.title.seeker] recognize the importance of such mundane tasks.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: C'est bon de voir qu'un jeune \v[lore.title.seeker] reconnaisse l'importance de ces petits travaux mondains.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: You can find the guard in question in the central area of the Marketplace, near the \v[lore.title.seeker]-HUB.\.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous trouverez le garde en question au centre de la place du marché, près du Repère des \v[lore.title.seeker]s.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Ask her about the problem and solve the case.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Demandez la pour savoir quel est le problème et résolvez l'affaire.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Well then, in that case you better get going.\. I'm sure there are a few Ancient dragons in need of slaying.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bon, alors tu ferais mieux d'y aller.\. Je suis sûr que quelques dragons Anciens t'attendent et ne demandent qu'à être vaincus.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: You better get going, recruit, before it's too late.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous feriez mieux d'y aller, recrue, avant qu'il ne soit trop tard !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: I already got the report.\. You did a fine job out there... for a rookie.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: J'ai déjà reçu le rapport.\. Vous avez fait un bon travail là-bas... pour une recrue.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: In any case, you are welcome to help us out again in the future.\. The Rookie Harbor Guard is always busy.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: En tout cas, sachez que votre aide restera toujours la bienvenue.\. Il y a toujours quelque chose à faire à la Garde Portuaire.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Nice to see you around, rookie.\. We have need of your assistance again.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: C'est bon de vous revoir, recrue.\. Nous avons encore besoin de votre assistance.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: As if the usual struggle with the Track isn't enough, we have violent threats growing from within our own settlements.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Comme si le Tracé nous causait pas assez de tracas, voilà qu'on a des menaces plus sérieuses qui viennent directement de nos cités.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: And it seems like some people are smuggling dangerous weapon systems onto the continent through our harbor.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Nous suspectons que des contrebandiers importent illégalement des systèmes d'armement dangereux vers le continent en passant par notre port.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Needless to say, this is a danger for every law-abiding citizen on the planet.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Inutile de vous dire, que c'est un danger pour tout citoyen honnête sur cette planète.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: So, can I count on your help again?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Donc, puis-je compter à nouveau sur votre assistance ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Excellent.\. We already got \c[3]Officer Cedric\c[0] investigating the case right on location.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Excellent.\. Nous avons déjà mis \c[3]l'Officier Cedric\c[0] sur le coup, il doit déjà être sur place.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Meet up with him at the harbor at \c[3]Beginners Arc\c[0] and he will brief you on the details.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous le trouverez à l'\c[3]Arcade des débutants\c[0] au port. Il vous donnera plus de détails.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Got too important already to handle boring guard work, huh?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Ah. Madame est déjà devenue trop importante pour ce petit travail de garde ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: You better go to the harbor, before more weapons get through.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous feriez mieux d'aller au port, avant que davantage d'armes ne transitent par là.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Cedric already made a report and brought the criminal in.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Cedric a déjà rédigé un rapport et mis le criminel derrière les barreaux

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: For such an unimpressive guy, he sure caused a lot of trouble.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Pour un petit bougre, il a vraiment causé pas mal d'ennuis.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Yes, it's unlikely that he acted alone.\. For starters, those shipments must have been sent by someone else.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Oui, c'est peu probable qu'il ait agis seul.\. Pour commencer, il a bien fallu que quelqu'un les expédie.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: We'll put him through some sharp interrogation 'til he spills the beans about his accomplices.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: On va l'interroger et le cuisiner jusqu'à qu'il nous dise tout ce qu'il sait sur ses complices.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Right, that's on us now.\. Cedric told me that you did well in handling this, so enjoy your reward.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bon, assez bavardé.\. Cedric m'a dit que vous avez bien géré la situation, donc voilà votre récompense.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Found your way back to humble \v[area.rookie-harbor.name], eh?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Vous êtes revenu dans notre modeste ville de \v[area.rookie-harbor.name], hein ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: About time, frankly.\. The whole weapon smuggling business didn't do us the courtesy of just stopping.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Il était temps : Le trafic d'arme nous a pas fait l'honneur de disparaitre.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: In fact it has only gotten worse.\. You got some free time again, to make a contribution to a peaceful society?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: En fait, il n'a fait qu'empirer.\. Vous n'auriez pas du temps libre pour rendre service à la société ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Good to see you didn't forget your roots.\. Stopping criminals like the old days.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: C'est bon de voir que vous n'avez pas oublié vos racines.\. De pourchasser le crime comme au bon vieux temps.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Problem is, they're not delivering their shipments to our harbor the usual way, where we can find and catch them.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Le problème, c'est qu'ils ne livrent pas leur marchandises au port comme avant, sinon on aurait pu les attraper.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Instead the weapons are sent over the ocean on their own to who knows what secret transfer point.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: À la place, les armes transitent toutes seules au-dessus de l'océan, vers on ne sait où.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Basically we have to catch and destroy them midway on their route from \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name].
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: En fait, il faut qu'on les intercepte dans leur trajet depuis \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name] et qu'on les détruise.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: We got something prepared.\. Go to \c[3]Beginners Arc\c[0] and talk to \c[3]Captain Turbine, South of the teleporter\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: On a préparé quelque chose pour ça.\. Allez à l'\c[3]Arcade des Débutants\c[0] et parlez au \c[3]Capitaine Turbine, au sud du téléporteur\c[0]. Il vous attend.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: He will give you a more detailed briefing and send you in the right direction.\. Now get going, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Il vous expliquera notre plan et vous enverra dans la bonne direction.\. Au travail, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Bye!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bye !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Got no more time for boring ol' \v[area.rookie-harbor.name], eh?\. Quite a shame.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous n'avez plus de temps pour cette ville ennuyeuse de \v[area.rookie-harbor.name], hein ? C'est dommage.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Go to \c[3]Beginners Arc\c[0] and talk to \c[3]Captain Turbine, South of the teleporter\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Allez à \c[3]Arcade des Débutants\c[0] et parlez au \c[3]Capitaine Turbine, au sud du téléporteur\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: He will explain how to stop those shipments.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Il vous expliquera comment arrêter ces trafics.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Welcome back, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I already received the combat report.\. Splendid work.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Rebienvenue, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. J'ai déjà reçu le rapport d'intervention.\. Un travail formidable.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: What you sunk must've been an entire month's worth of work.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Les marchandises que vous avez coulées devaient facilement représenter un mois de travail.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: That should set them back a lot and give us some room to breathe and work on long-term solutions.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Cela devrait avoir stoppé net leurs projets et retarder leurs plans. Cela devrait nous permettre de souffler un peu et de réfléchir à une solution à plus long terme.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Well, I'm sure we will see you around again, when the time comes.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bon sinon, je suis sûr que nous nous reverront, quand le temps sera venu.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Until then, good fortune on your adventures, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: En attendant, bonne chance pour vos aventures, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Bye!
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bye !

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler
Salut !
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Hi!

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Un \v[lore.title.seeker], qui arrive encore juste à temps.\. J'imagine qu'une vie d'aventures grandioses ne valent toujours pas le charme de \v[area.rookie-harbor.name].
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], arriving just in time again.\. I guess a life of grand adventure still can't beat the charms of \v[area.rookie-harbor.name].

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Lea...
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Lea...

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Mais on parlera d'autrefois plus tard ! Nous avons enfin l'opportunité de mettre un terme à ce commerce de contrebande.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Well, no time for reminiscing about the old days now!\. We finally got the opportunity to put the lid on that damn smuggling business.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Est-ce que l'on peut compter sur vous pour terminer le travail ?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Can we count on your assistance to finish this job?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Excellent, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Je savais que je pouvais compter sur vous comme je peux compter sur l'un d'entre nous.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Excellent, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I knew that I could rely on you like on one of my own.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Cette opération vous sera famillière.\. Vous dirigerez une patrouille sur l'océan pour intercepter une livraison d'armes de contrebande.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: This operation will be familiar to you.\. You will lead a patrol on the ocean to intercept a delivery of illegal weaponry.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Mais cette fois, nous allons mettre un terme à ce traffic une bonne fois pour toutes en détruisant aussi le coordinateur !
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: However this time we will end the smuggling once and for all by also destroying the coordinator!

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Oui, cette fois on va aussi s'attaquer au chef.\. Une solution évidente, mais plus facile à dire qu'a faire dans les règles.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Indeed, taking out the leader.\. An obvious solution, but usually easier said than done.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Le \c[3]Captaine Turbine\c[0] vous donnera encore une fois tous les détails.\. Retrouvez le à l'\c[3]Arcade des Débutants\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: \c[3]Captain Turbine\c[0] will fill you in on the details, just like last time.\. Visit him at \c[3]Beginner's Arc\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bonne chasse, \v[lore.title.seeker].
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Good hunting, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bye.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Bye.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [secoue la tête]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [shakes head]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous refusez de protéger notre vieux village ?\. Il nous reste encore du temps avant que l'on commence, donc vous feriez mieux d'être là à temps.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Refusing to protect your nostalgic hometown?\. There's still time until we start, so you better come around on this.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Retournez à l'\c[3]Arcade des Débutants\c[0] et reparlez au \c[3]Capitaine Turbine, au sud du téléporteur\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Return to \c[3]Beginners Arc\c[0] and have another talk with \c[3]Captain Turbine, South of the teleporter\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Salut !
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Hi!

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. D'après ces rapports, vous avez fait du travail véritablement exemplaire là-bas !
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. According to these reports you have done some truly exemplary work out there!

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Le coordinateur est tombé et dans les décombres nous avons recupéré des données qui pourraient nous mener vers les instigateurs de ces crimes.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: The coordinator is down and from its wreck we recovered data that can lead us to the instigators behind these crimes.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: C'est une victoire pour la justice et pour la sécurité de tous les personnes sur \v[lore.title.planet].
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: This is a victory for justice and the safety of every honest person on \v[lore.title.planet].

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Nous vous devons des fiers remerciements, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Nous oublierons jamais le service que vous nous avez rendu.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: We owe you great thanks, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Your service will always be remembered.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bye !
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Bye!

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], les choses se passe bien, entre autres grâce à votre aide.\. Prenez un café et un beignet si vous le voulez, pour vous remémorer l'ancien temps.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], things are going smoothly, in no small part to your help.\. Take a coffee and a donut for old times, if you want.
Sgt. Brassler
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Sgt. Brassler

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Ah, a \v[lore.title.seeker] graces the plain ol' city guard with her presence.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Ah, un \v[lore.title.seeker] honore notre bonne vielle caserne de sa présence.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.note: caserne might be bad, but the alts are ugly

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Got some time off from solving ancient mysteries, do you?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous avez un peu de temps libre à nous accorder, entre deux mystères des anciens ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Well, we could also use some help here in the city.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: On pourrait avoir besoin d'un petit coup de main ici, en ville.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: One of our watchmen at the market called for reinforcements a moment ago.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Un de nos gardes a demandé des renforts au marché il y a peu.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: None of those fancy Trackwalking-adventures, I suppose, but matters of inner security are not to be taken lightly either, yes?
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Ce n'est hélas pas aussi important que l'aventure du Retraçage, mais la sécurité intérieure ce n'est pas non plus quelque chose à prendre à la légère, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: It's good to see a young \v[lore.title.seeker] recognize the importance of even mundane tasks.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: C'est bon de voir qu'un jeune \v[lore.title.seeker] reconnaisse l'importance de ces petits travaux mondains.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: You can find the guard in question in the central area of the Marketplace, near the \v[lore.title.seeker]-HUB.\.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Vous trouverez le garde en question au centre de la place du marché, près du Repère des \v[lore.title.seeker]s.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Ask her about the problem and solve the case.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Demandez la pour savoir quel est le problème et résolvez l'affaire.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Well then, in that case you better get going.\. I'm sure there are some Ancient dragons in need of slaying.
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Bon, alors tu ferais mieux d'y aller.\. Je suis sûr que des dragons Anciens t'attendent et ne demandent qu'à être vaincus.

maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.orig: Guard
maps/rookie-harbor/inner-faction-rhg-gua.text: Garde
